name: BiggerSoccer
description: A style sheet which helps to make the newest update to www.bigsoccer.com be more readable and similar to the old version of Big Soccer.
additional_info:
- Decrease the padding between messages in a thread
- Thin out the message seperating border
- Slight decrease in space between poster info and message
- Remove the muted grey look on message authors in a post to make them more easily read
- Make the break between message content and meta data visible with a thin dividing line
- Decrease the spacing between forums in the watched forum list
- Hide avatars in thread list, but still show the I've replied to this thread indicator
- Remove muted grey color on thread list author
- Remove the mouse over on the page navigation items in the thread list to show them all the time
